explain: Manchester City, seeking to acquire promising young talent, focuses on signing 14-year-old playmaker Evangelos Patoulidis from Anderlecht, whose impressive skills have already attracted attention from Barcelona's academy.

Manchester City is targeting the 14-year-old playmaker Evangelos Patoulidis from Anderlecht, known for his exceptional skills. The youngster opted against a move to Barcelona's La Masia academy even though he had offers from other top European clubs like Arsenal and Barcelona as well.
Despite early rejection of Barcelona's academy, teenager Evangelos Patoulidis, now 14, has impressed significantly and caught Manchester City's interest due to his exceptional talent.
